title: Agate Fossil Beds National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons            Visitor Center and Museum         A park ranger lowers the flag as the visitor center closes for the day.   Summer Hours Daily from May 15th until September 30th - 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.   Winter Hours Daily from September 30th until Mid-May - 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.  Visitor Center Closings Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Year's Day       Trails The monument's two trails--the Daemonelix and the Fossil Hills Trails--are open year-round from dawn to dusk.
